name: starry twitter ✧・ﾟ
description:
dark, cute, customizable twitter theme; bg image credits: angela he (@zephybite)

(custom theme color only works if theme color set to default blue (more > display))

user.name: birb-naise
user.about:
hi    i make stuff sometimes
if you're the original artist and want me to take your stuff down, then feel free to @ me on twitter

also stan loona
